sentences.sContent: ...an attempt by the president to disassociate the military from politics.
sentences.sCn: ...总统对分离军政的一次尝试。

trans.tranCn: 使分离（过去式disassociated，过去分词disassociated，现在分词disassociating，第三人称单数disassociates，名词disassociation）
trans.tranOther: If you disassociate one group or thing from another, you separate them
